description:
Garett has been a busy boy. I hadn't heard from him in a while, then all of a sudden he sent me an e-mail. He had seen Patrick on the site and was interested in doing a film with him. He told me he was going to be in my neck of the woods and wanted to see if I could set it up.
Since working with me, Garett has gone on to become quite the little porn star. It really doesn't surprise me because he's got a hot body and he's a great top. I love working with him and was excited to have him out.
I wanted to call this film "Patrick and Garett Flip-Flop" because they take turns fucking each other, but I opted for the shorter version instead. Patrick has become an increasingly voracious bottom and there's a lot of hot fucking going on...
title: Patrick & Garett
